title: Twitter-Mcp
description: This MCP server enables interaction with Twitter via API, supporting posting tweets and searching for tweets.
creator: EnesCinr

API_KEY.description: The API key for accessing the Twitter API.

API_SECRET_KEY.description: The API secret key for accessing the Twitter API.

ACCESS_TOKEN.description: The access token for authenticating Twitter API requests.

ACCESS_TOKEN_SECRET.description: The access token secret for authenticating Twitter API requests.
